name: Emoji.io Free Casual Game
description:
From the creator of fidget spinner .io games, the newest io game comes to you.

Emoji.io free Casual game with unique game-play! Hook your opponents and collect the dots. The more powerful you become, then you can attack other players! In the begging you are small creature, for growing you need to eat small dots. If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. Increase your speed by eating,collect dots or hitting other emoji's. But take care! Your enemies are extremely smart.

In emoji.io, you have a chance to win even if you're tiny. You can swerve in front of a much larger player to defeat them, no matter how big you are!

A clash will happen anytime and anywhere! You need to have very good strategy. You can defeat a much larger player, no matter how small you are! Survive and eat long enough to become the biggest emoji's in the games! The controls fully compatible mobile and very simple. An enjoyable game with virtual joystick is waiting for you. Play online for free for all actions and use splitting, shrinking and dodging strategy to catch other players. If you love emoji games?then this is for you, download this "Emoji.io Free Casual Game" and be the king among your friends and see how long can you survive?
